EmailTemplate.subject: Junior School Information Evening: Wednesday 14 March, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for considering St Andrews Cathedral School for your child’s education and development. As requested, you have been booked into our Junior School Information Evening on Wednesday 14 March at 5.30pm. We will email you again closer to the date to remind you and provide further details.
In the meantime, if there's anything else we can help you with, please do not hesitate to contact us.
To keep up to date with what’s happening across our K-12 St Andrew’s community, visit our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.
Yours Sincerely,
Robyn Pedley Enrolment Assistant
